attributes.title: Expecting more
attributes.review: I’m not usually one to complain and write a bad review but this app was completely redundant and lacked luster. I was hoping to be able to help my community and inform myself with this app but all it did was confuse me and make my phone slower which I find completely unacceptable. The app lacked creativity and balance which honestly reminds me of my parents marriage.

attributes.title: app stinky
attributes.review: this app made my phone run slower and made me feel a little icky having it downloaded. I would really love to see it taken off of the app store because i’m pretty sure it gives your phone a virus? kinda gives off a racist vibe and we need to leave that in the last century. overall would not recommend to anyone 💖👄🙈🧚

attributes.title: terrible.
attributes.review: i downloaded the app to stay updated on donny but every time i opened it it would glitch, i restarted my phone but now it’s at the point where i cant even go on the app because if i do my phone freezes.  i KNOW it’s not my phone because i have an iphone 11, this app does not work!! at all!  please fix it or delete it.

attributes.title: Lags
attributes.review: I’m not a supporter of the whole gen z thing going around on TikTok, but this app was extremely laggy and stopped me from getting into any other of my games, it’s not a good app and it takes up too much space for me, I hardly have any photos or apps and this definitely didn’t happen before I downloaded this. I don’t recommend it!

attributes.title: oh my🤦🏻‍♀️
attributes.review: i was extremely disappointed. so i was trying to download the app and support trump in his campaign and i was disappointed because the app made my iphone 10 shut down when upon opening it. i thought maybe it was a malfunction cause i’ve had my phone for about a year, but then once i turned on my phone again, it said it wouldn’t turn back on so i went to the tech store and they said i had a virus on my phone cause by this app. ik the whole tik tok ban thing and how this needs to get down to a one star, but i didn’t expect the app to actually be so bad. please don’t download this app.

attributes.title: Terrible???
attributes.review: First of all why do you need to verify to be above 18?? Shouldn’t anyone of any age show their support for our just amazing president :(( non inclusive!! 😡👊 if my baby cousin can’t join me then i! Don’t! Want it! Doesn’t even work either. I feel like I should be able to send my mans direct messages. Come back when I can tell my idol what ever I want on the daily

attributes.title: What? A Virus?
attributes.review: What’s going on with this app? It keeps crashing.  It’s like my phone got a Chinese Virus from this app. My phone is running out of energy way quicker now.  I need to keep it charging on the iHome all the time. Ever since I downloaded this app my phone won’t change to dark mode. All the notifications were in CAPS anyway. I’m voting it out and downloading a new app.

attributes.title: THE worst app.
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes of seeing and keeping up with what our president Donald Trump has been up to during the re-elections and what he plans on doing prior to all of that. However as soon as I opened the app it kept crashing and now my phone won’t stop bugging no matter what I do. Thanks a LOT. if I could give this app 0 stars believe me I would.

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: trump is racist rapist homophobe he shouldn’t be in office. hisDecisions bigger white supremacy and sis gendered men which is really harmful to the better society we are trying to create as a whole. How come our country is trying to be better and more inclusive and everything that we do but we are like a president he doesn’t show those values. Trump is a white supremacist if you vote for Trump you are white supremacists.

attributes.title: STINKY🤢😡
attributes.review: The second I downloaded this app all of my crops died, famine hit, and my house flooded. I was looking forward to what bunker boy put out for us but this app has destroyed my home and finances🤧. When I opened the app up for the first time the plant next to me died from the pure stench of ignorance bunker boy spews. Not to mention my microwave explodes every time I even look at the app icon. 0/5 stars😾🦶 #settleforbiden
